title: Daily, Weekly, and Monthly Offerings
summary: Numbers 28 outlines the regular offerings Israel is to make: daily burnt offerings, Sabbath offerings, and offerings for the beginning of each month. These sacrifices are meant to maintain fellowship with God.

faq.question: Why were these offerings important?
